scene_description_enriched: A crowned king, with a long beard and clasped hands in prayer, stands in a landscape. He holds a spherical object in his hands. To his left, a harp is visible. In the sky above, an angel with wings and a sword descends. In the background, a cityscape with towers and walls is depicted, along with trees and foliage. The scene is framed by an ornamental border with floral motifs.
